text:
Hi,
I would like to submit implementation Batik SVG DOM preserveAspectRatio part for
SVGImageElement. 
All file is attached.

Regards
Tonny Kohar
creator: tonny@kiyut.com
tonny@kiyut.com
text:
the aspect_ratio_update.zip is the update of the previous file for init process
bug. It contain the all files, so just ignore the preserveAspectRatio.zip

Regards
Tonny Kohar

aspectratio_update_license2.zip is the same file just change the header to
Apache License 2.

When the patch is accepted I also would like to update
- SVGOMUseElement
- SVGOMViewElement
for preserveAspectRatio support. It is only a simple 1 line change.
Do I need to upload these files as well?

Regards
Tonny Kohar
creator: tonny@kiyut.com
tonny@kiyut.com
text:
This time is contains patch.diff file and all the source file and test-case,
hopefully this is the correct format for diff stuff :)

I also updated all the element that reference preserveAspectRatio which is
- SVGOMImageElement
- SVGOMPatternElement
- SVGOMSVGElement
- SGOMSymbolElement
- SVGOMMarkerElement
- SVGOMViewElement

A test case is included also, it is under
test-resources/org/apache/batik/dom/svg/bug30580.svg
